name: assimp

variants.name: shared
variants.description: Enables the build of shared libraries

description:
Open Asset Import Library (Assimp) is a portable Open Source library to
import various well-known 3D model formats in a uniform manner.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: qt
dependent_to.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependent_to.name: dd4hep
dependent_to.description:
DD4hep is a software framework for providing a complete solution for
full detector description (geometry, materials, visualization, readout,
alignment, calibration, etc.) for the full experiment life cycle
(detector concept development, detector optimization, construction,
operation). It offers a consistent description through a single source
of detector information for simulation, reconstruction, analysis, etc.
It distributed under the LGPLv3 License.

dependent_to.name: dealii
dependent_to.description:
C++ software library providing well-documented tools to build finite
element codes for a broad variety of PDEs.

dependent_to.name: vapor
dependent_to.description:
VAPOR is the Visualization and Analysis Platform for Ocean, Atmosphere,
and Solar Researchers. VAPOR provides an interactive 3D visualization
environment that can also produce animations and still frame images.
